author: Doreen Christensen
title: Small oatmeal for 25 cents at Whole Foods Market
text:
Small oatmeal for 25 cents at Whole Foods Market Get a small oatmeal at Whole Foods for a quarter. Doreen Christensen Sun Sentinel Get a hot breakfast for quarter at Whole Foods Market. 
Get a small oatmeal for a quarter at Whole Foods Market. 
The hot breakfast is offered in stores until 10 a.m. daily through Friday, Oct. 23. 
Click here for the deal.
